contentitemdata.goldfinch.blogpost.BlogPostSummary: UI page extenders in Xperience by Kentico allow you to customise existing UI pages without modifying their source code. In this post, we’ll walk through a simple example of reordering columns in a listing layout to better suit your needs.
contentitemdata.goldfinch.blogpost.DocumentName: How to Easily Extend Xperience by Kentico UI Pages with Page Extenders
